comments.en:
It seems to have the same firmware as Okipage 4w.

Only seems to generate 300x300dpi class output.

Flávio Coelho (fccoelho at uerj dot br) reports that this printer only works with the old 2.0 version of the "oki4drv" driver.

Please report whether it works with the "oki4w" Ghostscript driver.
